name: RoseGuy's Town Meeting
description:
This is  a portfolio piece! (Don't be dissapointed that its not a full game... You have been warned!)

I made this because I wanted to get a better grasp of workflow in UE4. Though there are a few things I would have done differently if I had it to do over, I still think it turned out pretty well!

CONTROLS:

Move: Arrow Keys, WASD, D-Pad or Left Stick

Interact: Space, E, Left Controller Button or Bottom Controller Button

Exit 'Game' (Portfolio Piece): Escape
